text_p_banner.banner_img_01.jpg: Zay Shop is an eCommerce HTML5 CSS template with latest version of Bootstrap 5 (beta 1). This template is 100% free provided by TemplateMo website. Image credits go to Freepik Stories, Unsplash and Icons 8.
text_p_banner.banner_img_02.jpg: You are permitted to use this Zay CSS template for your commercial websites. You are not permitted to re-distribute the template ZIP file in any kind of template collection websites.
text_p_banner.banner_img_03.jpg: We bring you 100% free CSS templates for your websites. If you wish to support TemplateMo, please make a small contribution via PayPal or tell your friends about our website. Thank you.
